snippet.title: Dino Genesis Steam Early Access | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dino Genesis -https://store.steampowered.com/app/3556660/Dino_Genesis/
Releasing March 24th 2025! Wishlist on Steam to Support!

Dino Genesis is an action FPS that navigates you through the forgotten island, ISLA GENESIS. You will have to defend yourself from genetically created Dinosaurs, Arachnids and Insects while discovering the dark secrets of the island.
"Dino Genesis is a passion project by one developer to create an awesome dinosaur FPS.

The biggest inspiration for creating this game was trying to make something like the Jurassic Park Arcade games I grew up playing, Jurassic The Hunted and especially Trespasser (1998). As a solo developer and game enthusiast my aim is to discover what makes these games so timeless and repayable."

Why Early Access?
“As a solo developer I know I have a long way to go before living up to games like Trespasser, but with Early Access, I'm hoping community input and frequent updates will help shape Dino Genesis into the awesome Dinosaur FPS it needs to be!”

How is the full version planned to differ from the Early Access version?
“The full version is planned to include more content, features, dinosaurs and improvements based on feedback we receive during Early Access. We aim to expand the overall scope of the game by adding new gameplay elements,
My vision is to make a really great and fun Dinosaur FPS.”

What is the current state of the Early Access version?
“The current game includes a 2-3 hour long story, 4 usable weapons, 6 different dinosaur species and recorded audio logs left behind on the Island to discover. Contains an original soundtrack”
As you play through the game, you will discover new species of Dinosaurs, Arachnids and Insects that want nothing more than to stop you from getting off the island.

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

#earlyacces
